title: The currency system for newish players
body: I started playing in early s7 and then I felt like I could grind for ip to buy new champions but now I'm level 30 (36) and leveling takes quite a bit of time and it isn't as rewarding in the new IP/BE department and I feel like I have to pay to get the champs that I want. The only solution that I have thought of is creating new accounts and starting new, but when leveling becomes hard. Do I just make ANOTHER account just to get more champs that I don't own? FeelsBadMan

replies.body:
Well, if you kept creating accounts you would eventually have all of that content spread out and need to keep relogging to play certain things. If you keep playing on the same account you'll start getting better rewards from higher levels and milestone levels, and can eventually have everything unlocked in one place. 

We're definitely looking through and gathering this feedback on the new system though! Please hit up [**Cactopus in his thread over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/hAaYMrEs-leveling-and-rewards-early-impressions-and-adjustments) with this feedback so the Devs can see this!
If it becomes such a greater reward along the way then I guess it's achievable to level now :D
